name: Mori Mori Photography Club
description:
So, this is what a private academy is like. I've just transferred to Mori Mori private academy from Tokyo, and thus far, everyone is kind enough... My name is Takashi Toono, I've been at this school for less than a day and I've regrettably already joined my first club. From what I’ve heard, there’s some interesting personalities inside. Yuri, loud and erratic. Akemi, small and intimidating. Itome, a quiet giant. Tamura, aggressive and pushy. Shikatani, distant and cold. As well as three others I’ve heard being talked about; a fellow transfer student, a quiet and nervous boy, and some kind soccer player. Then there’s me, a bland, everyday average student... Hopefully the photography club is easy enough, not like anything could go wrong... right? 

Play as Takashi Toono from the series Yarichin Bitch Club in this new fan game dating sim by Aesthetic Accidents Atelier! Currently only a demo is out but we're working hard to get the game out <3

Game content may not be suitable for children under the age of 13.
